description:
Fedora Asahi Remix 40 distribution is now available for Apple Silicon Macs based on Fedora Linux 40 and the KDE Plasma 6 desktop environment. Here's what else is new!

The post Fedora Asahi Remix 40 Is Now Available for Apple Silicon Macs with KDE Plasma 6 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fedora Asahi Remix 40 Is Now Available for Apple Silicon Macs with KDE Plasma 6
